articles.title: Maternal Cytokine Levels Linked to Child's Mental Health - Neuroscience News
articles.description: Researchers discovered a critical role for the cytokine XCL1 in fetal brain development and the emotional behavior of offspring, challenging previous assumptions about its low impact due to minimal circulating levels during pregnancy.
